org.apache.archiva.repository.features

Class RemoteIndexFeature

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.archiva.repository.features.RemoteIndexFeature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RepositoryFeature<RemoteIndexFeature>

    public class RemoteIndexFeature
extends Object
implements RepositoryFeature<RemoteIndexFeature>
    Feature for remote index download.

      RemoteIndexFeature get()
      Returns the concrete feature instance.
      Duration getDownloadTimeout()
      Returns the timeout after that the remote index download is aborted.
      URI getIndexUri()
      The URI to access the remote index.
      String getProxyId()
      Returns the id of the proxy, that should be used to download the remote index.

      Returns true, if there is a index available.

      True, if the remote index should be downloaded.

      Returns true, if the remote index should be downloaded on startup of the repository.

      • getIndexUri

        public URI getIndexUri()
        The URI to access the remote index. May be a relative URI that is relative to the repository URI.
        Returns:

      • setIndexUri

        public void setIndexUri(URI indexUri)
        Sets the URI to access the remote index. May be a relative URI that is relative to the repository URI. The allowed URI schemes are dependent on the repository type.
        Parameters:
        indexUri - The URI of the index

      • isDownloadRemoteIndexOnStartup

        public boolean isDownloadRemoteIndexOnStartup()
        Returns true, if the remote index should be downloaded on startup of the repository.
        Returns:
        true, if the index should be downloaded during startup, otherwise false.

      • setDownloadRemoteIndexOnStartup
